segments.text: I'm looking for some blush . Do you still have some in peach rose ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , yes , that is a beautiful color . It has been very popular blush this season . I have two left .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have you heard about our special promotion this month ? If you purchase at least 18 dollar 50 cents in any Elizabeth Arden products , you will receive this black poke with a sample of lipstick , mascara and two shades of white shadow .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wow , that sounds like a bargain . I'm running low on facial moisturizer and toner . Could you ring those up for me too along with the blush ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd be glad to . Do you need anything else ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , I almost forgot . It's my mum's birthday Saturday . I need to get her some more Chanel . Could you get me the 1.7 ounce bottle of Chanel cologne ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That would be my pleasure . I'll wrap the perfume up in the gift box for you too .
segments.speaker: S2
